page.title: 11CHARLTON YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Charlton Youth Club is held in the very modern Village Hall. Some of the activities held inside the Club are table tennis and snooker. Outside on the field rounders and cricket are played. You can dance to the music inside if you want to as well. You can buy sweets there and orange and cola flavoured drinks. The number of people who go to Youth Club is fifty. You have to be aged 10 years and over to attend the Club, but mainly older children attend. People who come to Youth Club often are brought by car but some walk as they live in the village. Three get to the Club by bicycle. About twelve other local organisations rent the Hall regularly for activites ranging from Toddler Group to Yoga. These groups pay rents to cover expenses.
